title: Chah Qad
text: Chah Qad () is a <a href="village">village</a> in <a href="Abdan%20Rural%20District">Abdan Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Abdan%20District">Abdan District</a> of <a href="Deyr%20County">Deyr County</a>, <a href="Bushehr%20Province">Bushehr Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2016 census, its population was 155, in 41 families.
